name: Alzahir
description:
Embark on a journey to help Alzahir, the once mighty demon god, break free from the grip of mind critters that have corrupted his power and mind. Explore a dark and dangerous world filled with ancient magic and unravel the mystery behind the corruption before it's too late in this thrilling adventure game.

Main Goal:

Activate 10 obelisks scattered throughout the game world.

Controls: 

MovementWASDAttackLeft Mouse ButtonPause GameEscape Button

Alzahir was made for the InfoSHOW'23 GameJam! Any and all feedback, game-dev tips are greatly appreciated!

Art & Programming done by me! @crystal_peach
